column4: does the ubuntu live cd have any built in apps for repairing ntfs drives?
i wouldn't count on it.. ntfs is not a linux favourite.. you can read/write with it.. but I've never seen anything that can fix it
i've got a friend that has a XP system thats wacked out, tryin to fix it for him
there are some live cd's that can repair ntfs disks.. perhaps a google for "repair cd" will give you something useful?
